structure.unit: ESCAPES, FUGITIVES FROM JUSTICE, AND EXTRADITION

law.catch_line: Returned person subject to prosecution for other crimes.
law.text: After a person has been brought back to this state by or after waiver of extradition proceedings, he may be tried in this state for other crimes which he may be charged with having committed here as well as that specified in the requisition for his extradition.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 29, effective June 16, 1960.
